description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型 (Giga) 半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

notes: ◎/ 限 50 人 / 機電所和製科所合開 / 請教務處安排教室

description.zh: 工業 4.0 智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. Cloud database technology is the core of an intelligent factory, which can reach the intelligent network and control from intelligent production order to website control.

notes: ◎/ 限 40 人 / 機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 於 2009 年，ASTM 定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: ◎/ 限 30 人 / 機電所和機械自動化班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

notes: ◎/ 限 21 人 / 機電所、製科所和機械自動化班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

notes: ◎/ 限 50 人 / 機電所、製科所、機械自動化班和能源車輛外

description.zh: 「企業領導力」是企業經營管理中非常重要元素和指標。我們將由學術理論和商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討企業領導力的管理策略；並著重於企業價值創新，以培育高教學生具有全球商業開發和經營管理的領導技能。
description.en: The course, Corporate leadership, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, theories and experiences for the development of business leadership practice and to achieve the corporate value creation. In the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world, the Corporate Leadership role is not just the corporate internal management concerning but also needs a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge and strategic thinking on business development, communication skills with innovative ideas, and management techniques for the long-term business goals. We will expand the scope and scale of the research related, review articles, complete class projects, and discuss real business cases.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意包括 10 個數值問題 1. 簡單熱傳導 2. 穩態圓柱熱傳問題 3. 完全展開管流 4. 翼片對流展開管流 5. 理想流體 6. 突然膨脹壓縮流 7. 自由對流完全展開流 8. 軸對稱流 9. 無限反應燃燒流場 10. 亂流流場
description.en: Including ten problems1. Simple pure conduction problem2. cylindrical conduction for steady non uniform k3. fully develop duct4. fin conduction convection for fully develop5. ideal flow6. sudden expansion compressible7. Free convective flow for fully develop8. Axial symmetry flow9. Infinitely combustion reaction10. Turbulent flow

notes: ◎/ 限 35 人 / 機電所、機械自動化班和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 「媒介與環境」作為近年逐漸開始發展的學術領域，其論述原點通常可追溯自 1960 年代，藉由 Marshall McLuhan 對於媒體（Media）與媒介（Medium）的哲學性討論與實驗性創作，首先打開後世電影與媒體學者對於相關學術主題的探討。但這個概念卻要一直到近年，伴隨著科技的進步與媒體研究的發展，例如 Anne Friedberg 針對當代可以出現在各種人造與非人造環境中的螢幕（Screen）的分析，才被廣泛地作為媒介（Medium）與環境（environment）研究仰賴的分析架構，並奠定後續此學術領域的發展方向。此課程將於都市文化研究的固有知識基礎上，引入媒介與環境領域的新興論述，探究各類「觸媒」對於當代文化發展與都市設計的影響。探討子題包含有數位全球化、文創嘉年華、智慧城市、網飛經濟等當前重要都市發展議題，並透過課堂討論、方法學作業，與期末短論培養學生連結理論與實務、深度反思、和獨立探索新興學術領域的能力。
description.en: The scholarship of “Medium and Environment” was first explored by Marshall McLuhan in the 1960s with a series of academic and practical works. However, this field was not gaining much attention until the past decade when technology has brought novel challenges and scholars in film and media have been shifting their focuses to this aspect. Because of these, the studies of medium and environment has recently been an emerging field that intends to examine the phenomena intertwining the two aspects through interdisciplinary approach. Based on this background, this course will introduce cutting-edge scholarships of medium and environment studies to the traditional field of urban cultural studies, pursuing effective perspectives to unfold today’s critical urban issues, for instance globalization in digital era, carnival and creative industry, smart city, Netflix economy (Harvey, 2020), and so forth. Student will be expected to learn how to bridge theories and practices, to develop critica

name.zh: 文化觸媒介入都市設計
name.en: Cultural Medium Intervening into Urban Design

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI， 蔡榮發老師 1 鐘點 朴維鎮老師 2 鐘點

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

notes: IMBA&IMFI， 趙莊敏老師 1 鐘點 楊神珠老師 2 鐘點

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋嵌入式工業視覺系統完整的開發內容，從機器視覺系統流程與演算法設計、嵌入式系統實作、函式庫封裝、人機介面設計、工業相機取像及實際案例分析。其中包含: 1. 嵌入式系統軟體實作：Linux 環境介紹與基本程式設計 2. Qt 人機介面開發 3. 工業用機器視覺演算法 / 系統開發，並提供相關設計概念 4. 實際應用案例與設計流程介紹。學生需要先有 C/C++ 程式語言及影像處理之基礎。
description.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic tools and techniques required to implement Machine Vision on small, embedded, portable platforms. The primary focus will be on the design of industrial vision system based on specialized embedded hardware, with a little less focus on machine vision algorithm. The course will involve: (1) Linux embedded software development; (2) Qt GUI development; (3) development of embedded industrial machine vision algorithm; (4) application practice on the embedded platform, with an industrial camera, to demonstrate real time vision processing. The only pre-requisite for the course is to know C/C++ and image processing.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1. 坡地災害防治的重要性 2. 坡地災害的全球性原因 3. 台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4. 台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5. 台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6. 坡地災害的人為因素 7. 坡地破壞之前兆 8. 坡地災害防治一般性原則 9. 坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10. 坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11. 坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12 坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統 (Geographical Information System，簡稱 GIs) 之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 電腦基本知識，中英文文書處理系統的基本設計理念與現有系統實習，電腦工作底稿功能架構說明及應用實習，資料庫管理系統基本觀念，工程資訊管理系統基本觀念，資料庫設計及資料庫軟體系統使用練習，簡易型之統計繪圖軟體及工程應用實例，其他現代電腦科技發展與其在結構上之應用個案。
description.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical AnalysisThe application of computer about civil engineering, such as officials Dispatch to handle in Chinese and English, the software of drawings and using software of data base etc.

name.zh: 數值分析在結構工程上之應用
name.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical Analysis

description.zh: 1. 政府採購法簡介 2. 標準作業模式 3. 特別採購模式 4. 建築師及工程顧問之甄選及聘用 5. 公平合約之訂定 6. 異議申訴制度 7. 其他
description.en: the management of financial affairs1.	the introduction of government purchasing law2.	standard working model3.	specific purchasing model4.	the choose and employ of architect and engineering consultant5.	the making of fair restrict6.	the making of reporting objection 7.	others

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程專案管理之架構為核心目標，說明營建專案管理介紹，應用及方法論介紹，專案管理研究方法、透過營建管理重要課題，藉由工程實務經驗，使修課同學得以瞭解抽象的管理理念，而後能實際加以運用。內容範圍包含專案管理研究方法、品質管理，風險管理，價值工程，生產力分析，合約管理，糾紛與談判等營建工程專案管理等理論或實務內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct engineering investigation research        General to say construct manage.        Schedule, capital, quality manage, risk manage,         value engineering, system method and theory.        Contract manage, arbitration, disagree handle,         coordinate and negotiations, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對營建管理領域重要課題以及營建時事進行分析探討，透過課題分析、報告以及討論，增進學生對於營建管理領域相關課題之了解及認知，進而思考日後可能面對的類似課題。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation drill of build engineering        Discuss and analyze subjects of construction         management domain and current issue. By the subjects         analysis, reports and discussion, students can          improve their abilities of understanding the         construction management domain, and thinking of         similar subjects they may have later.

name.en: Special Topics on Construction Project Management

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時，大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 行銷英文是為商業人士及學習商業英語的學生而安排的一種多位階的商業英文課程。課程教本已經與世界領先企業資源之一的美國 "經濟時代" 期刊合作完成。課程單元都是為了讓學生具備好的工具和應用技巧以便他們可以在國際企業和行銷上有成功的表現而設計。課程結束後，學生將有能力在全面的商業環境下用英文去充分的溝通；能夠在商業的世界中去發揮他們的知識，更流利而且有自信的運用商業語言，進而增加他們服務公司的繁榮與發展。
description.en: Marketing English is a multi-level business English course for businesspeople and students of business English. The course book has been developed in association with the Financial Times, one of the leading sources of business information in the world. The units are designed to equip students with the tools and skills they need to succeed in marketing and international business. At the end of this course, students will be able to communicate in English in a wide range of business situations; they will also enlarge their knowledge of the business world; and they will be more fluent and confident in using the language of business and should increase their companies’ prospects.

notes: 英語畢業門檻補救措施 / 不計入畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

notes: 自動化所、機電博班 (含外生班) 合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 本課程以我國智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為教材，介紹電腦軟體、醫藥、生物、中草藥之專利申請審查，以及新型專利形式審查和舉發審查。
description.en: The textbook of this course is "Patent Examination Guidelines" which is issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office. We will introduce the examination practice for special patent cases, such as computer software, medicine, biology, and Chinese herbal medicine. In addition, the examination of utility model patent and patent invalidation will also be discussed in this course.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (III)

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 教學目標課程目標：執行計劃的現金流量計劃，並通過提供的財務指標進行分析，從而可以就是否方便執行項目做出全面的決策。在本主題中，模型和項目評估標準為決策提供了必要的要素，尤其是在是否實施投資項目方面。學會識別和定義投資項目的主要成本效益參數”
description.en: Course Objectives：Execute a projected Cash flow planning, analyzing it by the Provided financial indicators that allow comprehensive decisions to be made on whether or not the execution of projects is convenient.In this subject the models and Project evaluation criteria that provide the necessary elements for decision-making, particularly on whether or not to implement investment projects. Learn to identify and define the main cost-benefit parameters of an investment project "

description.zh: 電腦運算速度的進展，隨著電子產業的快速進步，有很大的突破。因此，應運電腦模擬計算已經成為很多領域重要的工具之一。本課程將討論如何應用現今已有的免費分子模擬軟體，來進行分子設計與進一步了解其分子能階，及光譜預測。除此之外，應用在分子模擬上的分子力學，分子動力學，與量子化學的基本觀念也將一併闡述說明。課程中，除基本理論介紹外，也包含實際的軟體實作。
description.en: The progress of electronic industry accelerates the computer development so that computer simulation becomes one of the important tool in many fields. In this course, we will discuss how to apply the computer to assist the molecular structure design. In order to gain insight into the basic idea of structural design, the fundamental background in molecular mechanics, molecular dynamics, and quantum chemistry will be introduced. A practical software introduction will also be included in the course.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

notes: 電機所、自動化所、機械自動化所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹國內外的房屋生產系統和裝修技術案例。該課程將在以下主題中進行。A. 規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，  風險管理和資金分配方法。B. 設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。C. 施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。D. 裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。E. 拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。
description.en: This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.The course will be conducted in the following topics.A.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.B.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.C.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.D.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.E.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹數位遊戲發展理論以及數位遊戲創作美學理論，講解如何涵養遊戲美學與獲得數位遊戲媒材設計知識。上課內容包含數位遊戲發展、數位遊戲介面設計、數位遊戲表現模式、數位遊戲形式、以及數位遊戲趨勢以及實際設計小型 Flash 遊戲。教學方法包括：講解、討論、觀摩、以及示範操作。
description.en: This course is mainly an introduction to the theory of game media design and theory of digital game design aesthetics, showing students how to cultivate game aesthetics and acquire knowledge of digital game media design. Digital game development, digital game interface design, digital game presenting mode, digital game style, digital game trend, and small Flash game design will also be taught in class. This course will be carried out with lecture, discussion, emulation, and demonstration.

notes: 本系外碩，日碩及設計博合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 排光華 409, 外碩，日碩，設計博合開

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 排光華 409 建議碩一選修，外碩，日碩，職碩，設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程聚焦於未來智慧互動城市發展的理論、方法、技術應用與案例分析。在智慧城市中，民眾透過主動、被動、自主和社群平台進行交流和合作，以實現不同的生活目標。學生將獲得有關智慧互動城市領域主要研究主題和實驗實踐的知識，培養她 / 他在建設智慧互動城市方面的技能。課程內容主要將從互動和設計的角度介紹和討論不同的範例，例如普適計算、環境智能、增強和虛擬現實、環境智能、可適化人機介面、操作性介面、物聯網、智慧家居、社會規範、及空間感知… 等的應用情境與案例分析。與課程中，也將帶入不同的社會挑戰，並於學生分組專題，透過跨領域共作的模式，提出未來互動設計應用與智慧城市的方案。本課程將分為理論部分和實踐部分。理論部分涵蓋了開發和評估智慧互動系統的理論架構和方法，以及其實踐與應用方法。理論部分的部分內容將透過分組專題，同時學習理論的內容及其應用實踐的實務。
description.en: The main theme of the course is theories, methods, technologies and case studies for the development of future smart interactive cities where humans and proactive, reactive, autonomous and social platform communicate and cooperate to reach goals. The student will acquire knowledge about main research themes and experimental practices in the field of smart interactive cities as well as develop her/his skills in constructing and smart interactive cities. Different paradigms will be introduced and discussed, primarily from an interaction and design perspective such as ubiquitous computing, ambient intelligence, augmented and virtual reality, intelligent and adaptive user interfaces, tangible interfaces, persuasive technology, decision-support systems, Internet of Things, smart homes, social norms, and spatial awareness. Different societal challenges will also be addressed through cross-disciplinary collaboration in student projects. The course is divided into a theoretical part and a prac

notes: 排六教 526, 外碩，日碩，職碩，設計博合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: ◎/ 阮于軒 (新聘)/ 限 30 人

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 資工光電合開，博班必修，碩士不計學分，須面談加簽

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 日職車輛所、能源所、機電博班 (含外生班)、能源車外生

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e 化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to offer student a sound introduction of supply chain management relative issues. It includes industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     1. 分子動力學模式的建立  2. 基本守恆律與週期性邊界  3. 硬球模式  4. 分子動力之差分邏輯  5. 軟球模式  6. 靜態性質  7. 內能、壓力、均方根力、比熱、熵  8. 軸向分佈函數  9. 動態性質  10. 時間相關函數  11. 愛因斯坦關係式  12. 格林 - 克伯關係式  13. 擴散係數  14. 黏性係數  15. 動態結構（空間 - 時間相關係數）
description.en: 1.	Establishment of the Molecular Dynamic models 2.Conservative systems and periodic boundary conditions  3.Hard sphere model  4.Algorithms for Molecular Dynamics  5.Soft sphere model  6.Static Properties  7.Internal Energy, Pressure Mean Square for 4, specific heat, Entropy  8.Redial distribution Function  9.Dynamics Properties  10.Time Correlation Function  11.Einstein Relation  12.Green-Kubo Relation  13.Diffusiaity 14.Viscosity  15.Dynamic Structure(Space-Time Correlation)

notes: ◎/ 林正釧 (新聘)/ 限 30 人 / 機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X 光電子光譜儀 (XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀 (LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀 (STM)、表面振動光譜儀 (surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法 (TPD) 及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2) 細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3) 基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4) 實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62 標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

notes: 日職合開，6/22 改五 / 第 ABC 節

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹科學和工程數值分析的理論，應用，和程式編撰，包括初步誤差分析、方程式求解、逼近法、微分方程、線性代數、線性和非線性回歸，與離散傅利葉變換。本課程著重於使用目前廣泛採用的數值分析開發環境與程式語言，並透過動手練習讓學生體驗數值分析技術在人工智能中的應用。 本課程學生應至少已完成微積分第一年的學生而設計。
description.en: This course introduces the theory, applications, and programming implementation of numerical analysis for science and engineering, including preliminary error analysis, solutions of equations, approximation, differential equations, linear algebra, linear and nonlinear regression, and discrete Fourier transform. Programming implementation is also intensed in the lectures using a current popular development environment for numerical analysis. The application of numerical analysis techniques on artificial intelligence is also introduced with hands-on exercises. This course is designed for engineering majors who have completed at least the first year of the calculus sequence.

notes: 土木館 208; 請自行攜帶筆電；大研合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以 VLSI 的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路 IC 方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹 2、各式數位訊號架構介紹 3、各式加減乘除法器架構 4、DCT、FIR、MPEG 等架構 5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構 6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

name.zh: VLSI 訊號處理架構設計

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

notes: 日職電子所、電資外生班和人工學程合開；70 人以上教室

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能 “簡單” 理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子三四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: 電子所、電資外生所和人工學程合開

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊系統簡介 2. 蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹 3. 無線電通訊的傳播原理 4. 行動通訊之調變技術 5. 行動通訊之多工技術 6. 天線﹑多元性與系統分析 7. 行動通訊之數位與語音編碼 8. 無線網路系統 9. 行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

notes: 電資外生四、日職電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 介紹智慧聯網及新世代網路在固定綜合網路、行動通信網路、網際網路及有線電視網路之現況與未來發展
description.en: To introduce internet of things and the system of next generation network over fixed 、mobile 、internet and cable network。

notes: 電子四甲乙與電子所合開

description.zh: 5G 行動通訊中的一個重要特色為使用毫米波頻帶，和傳統低於 6 GHz 的頻帶相比十分不同，使得 RF 元件從設計到量測都需要有不同的考量。本課程除介紹 5G 行動通訊的基本概念外，課程內容包含毫米波天線設計，以及電磁模擬軟體和量測儀器實務操作，希望能培養理論和實務兼備的學生。
description.en: One important feature of 5G mobile communication is the use of millimeter-wave frequency bands, which are significantly different from conventional sub-6 GHz bands. Therefore, it is necessary to have different consideration from design to measurement of RF components. This course introduces the fundamental concepts of 5G mobile communication, millimeter-wave antenna design and operations of electromagnetic simulation software and test equipment. It is expected that this course can train students not only in theory but also in practice.

name.zh: 5G 行動通訊簡介與毫米波天線設計
name.en: Introduction to 5G Mobile Communication and Millimeter-wave Antenna Design

notes: 日職合開，電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1.MOS 元件工作模式及 MOSFET 原理 2. 微小 MOSFET 的額外考慮 3. 矽晶圓的生長 4. 擴 散 5. 離子植入 6. 氧化處理 7.CVD 技術 8. 微影術 9. 蒸鍍與濺鍍 10. 光罩製作 11.CMOS IC 製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器，進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 簡介 2. 低雜訊放大器 3. 混波器 4. 振盪器 5. 頻率合成器 6. 功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 機器學習探討如何能由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能自動增進其處理效能。例如進行預測，特徵擷取，分類，模式辨認，決策，各種訊號處理，甚至建立人工智慧等等。本課程將介紹機器學習的基礎演算法、理論及工具。並讓學生嘗試在各種領域中實際實踐這些技術。課程內容包括：(a) 監督式學習（例如參數和非參數演算法、支持向量機和類神經網路等），(b) 無監督學習（例如群聚、降維和深度學習等）與 (c) 機器學習應用實例（例如語音信號處理，影像訊號處理，音訊訊號處理與自然語言處理，資訊擷取與資料搜尋等）。
description.en: Machine learning studies how to automatically learn from observed data to improve the performance of prediction, information extraction, clustering, pattern recognition, decision making, signal processing and even artificial intelligence. This course will introduce fundamental algorithms, theories and their practical applications. The content will cover (a) supervised learning, such as parametric and non-parametric algorithms, super vector machines and neural networks, (b) unsupervised learning, for example, data clustering, dimension reduction and deep learning and (c) practical applications on speech, image, audio signal and natural language processing or information retrieval and search, etc.

notes: 電子三四甲乙、電子所和人工學程合開

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動 IC 元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計 2、MOS 元件介紹                   11、混波器 3、被動 RLC 網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及 S 參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構 8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5. 分散式同作控制 6. 電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1.Process synchronization2.Concurrency Mechanisms3.Virtual memory4.Distributed Systems5.Distributed Concurrency Control6.Queuing Models

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

notes: 日職合開；70 人以上教室

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊系統簡介 2. 蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹 3. 無線電通訊的傳播原理 4. 行動通訊之調變技術 5. 行動通訊之多工技術 6. 天線﹑多元性與系統分析 7. 行動通訊之數位與語音編碼 8. 無線網路系統 9. 行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: Stories of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

name.zh: 英文傳奇故事：電影動漫及遊戲
name.en: Legends in Movies: Anime and Games

description.zh: 本課程提供關於語料庫應用的介紹，包含語料庫分析工具、分析方法、語料庫設計與建構，及語料庫為本的研究方法等；同時，本課程亦探討其在英語教學上的應用。主要的主題涵蓋字彙教學與學習、詞組分析、中介語分析、教材分析、言談分析，及電腦輔助語言學習等。修課學生將學習如何針對不同研究主題，收集語料、構建小型語料庫，並運用所學之語料庫軟體進行語料分析等。
description.en: This course offers an introduction to corpus linguistics, including the corpus analytical tools, techniques, corpus design and construction, and methodologies for doing corpus-based studies. We will also discuss its applications in English language teaching and learning. Major topics include vocabulary teaching and learning, analysis of chunks, teaching materials analysis, interlanguage analysis, discourse analysis, and computer-assisted language learning. Students are expected to learn to collect corpora data, create a small corpus, run and analyze corpora data according to different research topics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1. 光學基本定律 (3) 2. 球面光學系統成像 (3) 3. 雷射光傳播特性 (3) 4. 光纖 (6) 5. 輻射度學與光度學 (3) 二、物理光學   1. 光的電磁理論 (3) 2. 光波的疊加與分析 (3) 3. 光的干涉與干涉儀 (6) 4. 光學鍍膜 (3) 5. 光的繞射 (6) 6. 光的偏振 (3) 7. 晶體光學基礎 (6)
description.en: A、Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

notes: 光電所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 深度學習介紹，2. 監督式學習，3. 無監督式學習，4. 物聯網，5. 感知層，6. 網路層，7. 應用層，8. 深度學習與物聯網應用實例。
description.en: 1. Introduction to Deep Learning, 2. Supervised Learning, 3. Unsupervised Learning, 4. Internet of Things, 5. Perception Layer, 6. Network Layer, 7. Application Layer, 8. Deep Learning and Internet of Things

name.zh: 深度學習與物聯網應用
name.en: Deep Learning and Internet of Things

notes: 光電三四所、電資外生所和人工學程合開

description.zh: 本課程簡述醫院常用的儀器其背後的物理原理及整合應用。讓學生為未來進入醫材領域預備足夠的背景知識，將本系所學生將所學之光電領域能力，進一步擴展至生醫光電的應用進行跨領域的學習。內容提及電腦斷層、磁振造影、超音波、核子醫學、內視鏡等原理。
description.en: This course briefly introduces the physical principles behind the instruments commonly used in hospitals and their integrated applications. To allow students to prepare enough background knowledge for entering the field of medical materials in the future, and to further extend the optoelectronic capabilities that students in this department have learned to the application of biomedical optoelectronics for cross-field learning. The content mentions the principles of computed tomography, magnetic resonance imaging, ultrasound, nuclear medicine, endoscopy, etc.

notes: 電腦教室，光電三四所、電資外生所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1. 簡介 2. 光學尺 3. 干涉儀 4. 幾何誤差 5. 幾何光學尺 6. 雷射光學尺 7. 雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 原子結構、排列與運動、材料之顯微結構與相結構、材料之機械性質 - 疲勞、破裂、潛變、材料之電性 - 電傳導性與半導體性、材料之光性與介電性、材料之磁性、材料之熱學性質、材料在微電元件之應用、複合材料。9. 複合材料。
description.en: Contents:1.Fundamentals: Atomic scale structure, Crystal structure. 2.Microstructural development: Phase equilibriums and phase diagram. 3.Properties: Mechanical properties, Electrical properties, Dielectric properties, Magnetic properties, Thermal properties. 4.Composite materials.5.Applications on the Electrical-mechanical devices. Objectives: To improve the related knowledge of materials on the electrical-mechanical devices.

notes: ◎/ 限 50 人 / 機電所、製科所、機械自動化和能源外生班

description.zh: 先修課程：統計學基礎統計介紹、一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、隨機化區集法、拉丁方格法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

notes: ◎/ 限 40 人 / 部分課程須自備筆電

description.zh: 本課程介紹光電半導體的基本原理與應用，幫助同學們了解光電元件如發光二極體的製程、封裝、及測試技術的發展，由市場應用概況導入，含蓋設計研發、製造生產、與特性量測等範疇，說明光電元件的光熱電特性對元件效率的影響，並搭配實驗方式深入了解。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles and applications of optoelectronic semiconductors such as light emitting diodes to help students understand the fabrication process, packaging, and test technologies This course includes application, design and manufacturing. In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

name.zh: 光電半導體元件技術及應用
name.en: Optoelectronic semiconductor device technology and application

notes: */ 限 21 人 / 機電所和製科所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。類神經網路介紹：演算法，應用，與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合，近似推理理論，模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

notes: ◎/ 製科所必選課程之一 / 機電所、製科所和外生班合

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1. 精實製造系統概論 2. 價值溪流分析 3. 快速更換 4. 使用點 5. 源流品質 6. 團隊 7. 全員生產維護 8. 後拉式 / 及時 / 看板生產系統 9. 單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

notes: ◎/ 限 26 人 / 製科所必選課程之一 / 製科所、機電所和

description.zh: 1. 光纖通訊系統介紹 2. 光纖種類及特性 3. 訊號的退化 4. 發光器 5. 接收器 6. 中繼站及光放大器 7. 數位傳輸系統 8. 光固子及 DWDM 系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 先修課程：普通物理、工程數學。   從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical, and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental principles of semiconductors are introduced.

notes: 光電所和電資外生三合開

description.zh: 以光纖取代傳統銅纜，可避免干擾，傳輸品質佳。且傳輸服務不中斷，網路架構簡單。此外高速 FTTB 線路具有客戶頻寬管理功能，可依客戶需求提供更彈性、更高頻寬 (至 1Gbps)。FTTB 提供高速上網外，可提供企業 VPN、都會網路、校園專案及互動式多媒體 (MOD) 等多樣寬頻服務。
description.en: Using fiber optics to replace coaxial cable, the method could avoid interference and achieve high-quality of transmission as well as no interrupting transmission services and simple network architectures. Besides, high-speed FTTB have management functionality of customer broadband, which can provide requirements of more flexibility and high bandwidth to customers. FTTB could offer Business VPN, Metropolitan Area Network, school project, MOD, and various broadband services...etc.

name.en: Application of Fiber Optical Broadband Network

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制，電氣控制，數值控制，幾何數據處理，驅動系統，適應控制系統，監視系統與診斷系統，機器人控制，電腦整合精密機械系統．
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

notes: 限 25 人 / 製科所必選課程之一

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含：社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱 IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時 IR 的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對 IR 的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

notes: 英文授課  博碩課程

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容 (限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用 R 語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮 K 棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理… 等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授 XQ 程式交易軟體，撰寫 XS 程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹軟性計算的概念、特性與優點，旨在提供學生多種不同的技術解決相關問題。課程目標有二：(1) 相關軟性計算技術，包含：關聯分析、群聚分析、分類等；(2) 相關軟性計算技術應用，包含：時間序列分析、M-V Model、商業資料分析與組合管理等。
description.en: In this course, concepts, properties advantages of soft computing are introduced for providing various ways for students to solve problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related soft computing techniques, including association analysis, clustering, classification, etc; (2) related soft computing applications, including time series analysis, mean-variance model, business data analysis and portfolio management, etc.

description.zh: 醫學基礎、藥物學概論、預防醫學概論、醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、永續照護概論 、感染與傳染病防治概論、精神照護概論、一般醫學概論、急重症醫學概論、醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle  2. Pharmacology 3. Prophylaxis  4. Ethics and medical effects   5. Perpetual care  6. Infections management and prevention  7. Spiritual Care  8. General medicine 9. emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 化工所和 EOMP 合開

description.zh: 本課程適合碩士論文及大學專題報告實務應用。針對環境中的危害因子之認識、測定方法、採樣技術、分析方法，做一完整的解說，並讓學生能熟悉環境測定的進行，取得正確的量測數據。無進行實驗時，亦可使用模式數值解析方式，解決問題。無論是實驗或模式，最後仍應回歸數據統計分析，及專業圖表繪製。
description.en: This course is suitable for the practical application of master's thesis and university report. Give a complete explanation of the knowledge, measurement methods, sampling techniques, and analysis methods of environmental hazards, and enable students to be familiar with environmental measurement and obtain correct measurement data. When there is no experiment, the model analysis can also be used to solve the problem. Whether it is an experiment or a model, the final regression data should be statistical analysis, and professional figure/table drawing.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 防災所和 EOMP 合開 / 土木館 308

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析 2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制 3、電腦化的製造系統，如 CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN 及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

notes: ◎/ 限 26 人 / 請教務處安排教室 / 製科所、機電所和機

description.zh: 一、壩址工程地質案例研究二、隧道工程案例研討。三、邊坡穩定工程案例研討。四、道路工程案例研討。五、山坡地開發工程案例研討。六、超高層建築基礎工程案例研討。七、地震分析。
description.en: 1.Case study, geological case analysis for dam2.Tunnel engineering case study3.Slope stability case study4.Road engineering case study5.Slope development case study6.The foundation of extra high building case study7.Earthquake analysis

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究。有關科技開發案之技術開發管理，人力責任管理及時間任務管理等 PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) 之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

description.zh: 5G 行動通訊中的一個重要特色為使用毫米波頻帶，和傳統低於 6 GHz 的頻帶相比十分不同，使得 RF 元件從設計到量測都需要有不同的考量。本課程除介紹 5G 行動通訊的基本概念外，課程內容包含毫米波天線設計，以及電磁模擬軟體和量測儀器實務操作，希望能培養理論和實務兼備的學生。
description.en: One important feature of 5G mobile communication is the use of millimeter-wave frequency bands, which are significantly different from conventional sub-6 GHz bands. Therefore, it is necessary to have different consideration from design to measurement of RF components. This course introduces the fundamental concepts of 5G mobile communication, millimeter-wave antenna design and operations of electromagnetic simulation software and test equipment. It is expected that this course can train students not only in theory but also in practice.

name.zh: 5G 行動通訊簡介與毫米波天線設計
name.en: Introduction to 5G Mobile Communication and Millimeter-wave Antenna Design

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 限博士班修習，製科博和機電博 (含外生班) 合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
