description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 公平交易法是經濟憲法，也是維持市場交易秩序的根本大法。當現代企業與市場的結構愈趨複雜，公平交易法的角色也愈顯重要。本課程將以案例分析，帶領學生了解公平交易法的基本原則。最後，本課程將規劃呈現科技發展下的新興壟斷議題，帶領學生一起探討。
description.en: The Fair Trade Act is often considered as the economic constitution also a set of fundamental rules to maintain the order of market. This Act is getting more and more important in the modern economy while the market is getting more and more chaotic and complicated. This course is designed for students who intend to understand the principles of the Fair Trade Act by case studies, and who is interested to learn about emerging technology monopoly issues.

name.zh: 科技壟斷與公平交易法
name.en: Technology monopoly and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

notes: 英文授課  碩班課程

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題包括：電子商務的定義與架構、市場商機分析與風險評估、電子商務的經營模式及其對傳統經營模式造成的衝擊、顧客界面規劃設計、網路行銷與品牌塑造、實作導入、線上交易機制與資訊安全以及電子商務發展趨勢等相關議題，作深入淺出的探討。並以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: This course mainly includes the following topics: 1.Overview of EC; 2.The opportunity and risk evaluation; 3.The business models of EC and impact on traditional businesses. 4. User interface planning; 5.The marketing strategies of EC; 6.How to install an EC; 7.Online transaction mechanisms and information security etc. Some real-world cases will also be discussed to enhance students' understanding and obtain the best learning effects.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計 2. 電晶體電路分析與設計 3. FET 電路分析與設計 4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償 5. 功率放大器分析與設計 6. 回授放大器分析與設計 7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計 8. 震盪器分析與設計 9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹智慧機器人及 AR/VR 之知識領域相關議題，關於智慧機器人部分，主要包括：機器人學原理與分析方法、機器人的設計分析製造與應用、智慧機器人的歷史與未來的發展、機器視覺之原理與應用等；關於 AR/VR 部分，此概論課程將介紹 AR/VR 相關技術於現今智慧製造與服務業之應用，並展示 AR/VR 於不同工作環境設計之應用實例，如 VR/AR 軟硬體操作及體驗、各式追蹤系統介紹等等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of intelligent robot and applications of augmented reality and virtual reality. The course is designed to provide the followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robotics and analytical methodologies, 2. design, manufacturing, and applications of robots, 3. the history and the future of intelligent robot, 4. fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision, 5. overview about AR and VR technology applied in smart manufacturing and service industries, 6. applications and examples of AR/VR, e.g. software and hardware design and operation, various tracking systems, etc.

name.zh: 智慧機器人與 AR/VR 應用專題
name.en: Special Topics in Intelligent Robot and AR/VR Applications

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 電磁波在介質中的傳導 2. 光纖光學 3. 光纖種類及特性 4. 發光器 5. 接收器 6. 中繼站及光放大器 7. 光纖通訊系統 8. 光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 網際網路與相關應用程式從根本上改變了消費者日常生活的各個方面。行銷從業人員也已經將他們的工作轉移到了網路上。本課程的目的在於幫助學生認識網路資料分析在數位行銷領域中的作用，並實際應用網路分析工具和技術來監控網路行銷活動的績效。課程主題包括：Web 數據分析與行銷簡介、Web 日誌分析、網站表現指標和關鍵績效指標、網站監控和趨勢分析、網路廣告及網路分析的未來趨勢。
description.en: The Internet and web applications have fundamentally changed nearly every aspect of our daily lives. Marketing practitioners have shifted their efforts online. This module aims to help students recognise the role of web analytics within the digital marketing landscape, and practically apply web analytics tools and technologies to monitor performance of web based marketing activities. Topics to be covered include: Introduction to web analytics and web data driven marketing; Web server log analysis; Web metrics and key web performance Indicators; Web monitoring and trends analysis; Dashboard design; Navigation analysis; Online advertising; Future trends of web analytics.

name.zh: 網路行銷研究與資料分析

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，星期六 234，桃園集中上課

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，星期六 234，台北集中上課

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各 20 位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

description.zh: 輔具是輔助器具的簡稱，舉凡日常生活，能使活動更容易、方便的各種用具皆屬之，正確的使用輔具可以改變身心障礙者或老年人原本有障礙的生活，走入社會，降低社會成本。本課程為專案導向課程，課程中除教授輔具設計基本概念，透過實際個案訪談分析目標對象，以工作坊形式找出使用者痛點，進而發展解決方案，提出適切的輔具資源，以幫助身心障礙者或老年人族群。
description.en: Assistive device is the abbreviation of auxiliary equipment. For everyday life, all kinds of utensils that make activities easier and convenient belong to it. Correct use of assistive device can change the life of people with physical and mental disabilities or the elderly who have obstacles, and enter the society and reduce Social costs. This is a project-oriented course. The course introduces the concept of auxiliary equipment; students can also analyze target audience through different case studies. During workshops, it helps students indicate users’ pain points and develop the solutions. The goal of this course is to come out with the resources to help people with disabilities or the elderly.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是幫助學生發展創新和創業思維能力。本課程是以美國巴布森學院的創新創業課程為基礎。它使學生能夠快速了解創業所需的知識和技能，例如創業思維方式，自我理解，人際網絡，商業模式等能力。並在跨領域雙師的指導下，學習跨領域設計思考和溝通技巧的核心概念。我們希望本課程可以培訓新時代的跨學通才，並提高他們的競爭力。此課程為未來進入職涯架構接軌機制，也為產業注入強而有力的新能量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to help students to develop innovation and entrepreneurial thinking ability. The course is based on the entrepreneurship program courses from Babson College in the United States. It allows students to quickly understand the knowledge and skills needed for entrepreneurship such as mindset of entrepreneurship, self-understanding, network, business models, and to deliver the core concept of interdisciplinary design thinking and communication skills under the teaching of dual-instructors. We expect that this course can train new era interdisciplinary polymaths and enhance their competitiveness. This course also integrates students into the career track in the near future, and inject new power into the industry which is benefit to the society.

name.zh: 人本設計：創新創業設計思考跨域
name.en: Human-oriented Design: Interdisciplinary Experience Course of Innovative and Entrepreneurial Design

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯講座課程」，藉由業界主管與人員介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 創業講座 — 創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

description.zh: 課程將以體驗式教學訓練，提升學員表達技巧、舞台技巧、臨場反應。本課程主要目的在教授學生以設計思考思維與策略，運用主題式課程實戰小組簡報及個人簡報，快速釐清簡報製作及表達過程中重點，提升修課學員個人簡報製作能力及表達能力，幫助學生在未來創業及就業上以出色之個人簡報能力獲得面試者及投資者的青睞，領先於起跑點取得優勢。
description.en: The course will use experiential teaching training to improve students' expression skills, stage skills, and on-the-spot reactions. The main purpose of this course is to teach students establishing design thinking strategies. During the course practice group presentations and personal presentations training students to quickly clarify the key points in the process of presentation production and presentation, to improve the students' personal presentation production and presentation skills. Furthermore, assist students' entrepreneurship and employment in the future. Students who finished this course will be favored by interviewers and investors with his excellent personal presentation skills. And he will gain an advantage over the starting point.

name.zh: 企業最愛：高質感簡報溝通力
name.en: Corporate's Favorite: High-quality Communication and Presentation Ability

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題：語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本門科目主要為介紹隨機震動學基本理論、頻譜分析與小波分析理論。主要的授課內容涵蓋基本統計理論、隨機訊號定義、期望值與相關函數、傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉、功率頻譜密度函數、頻譜分析、非定常訊號判斷、基礎小波分析等。配合結構動力學，本科目亦講授結構系統受到隨機外力作用而產生之結構反應的頻率域動力分析應用及小波分析應用等範例。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basics of random vibration, spectral and wavelet analysis. The schedule includes those topics such as fundamental theories of statistics, definition of random signals, expectation and correlation functions, Fourier transform and F.F.T., power spectral density, spectral analysis, non-stationarity judgement, and basic theories of wavelet analysis. To harmony with Dynamics of Structures, this course also introduces examples of dynamic analysis of structural systems excited by random loadings in the frequency domain and applications of wavelet analysis.

name.zh: 隨機震動學與時頻分析
name.en: Introduction to Random Vibration and Time-Frequency-Domain Analysis

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論，技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理 & 經營策略實務，

description.zh: 本課程將介紹人工智慧概念以及在企業轉型中扮演的角色，目的在於增加對於人工智慧的瞭解以幾所應用的產業，人工智慧的技術概要介紹包含大數據、資料探勘、與機器學習也會整合於課程設計中，課程主要目的在於學習數位科技如何應用在不同的商業情境，以及如何調整在數位轉型時代下商業策略與運作，最後，學習如何將人工智慧成為競爭優勢的重要來源。
description.en: This course provides an overview of AI and its role in business transformation. The purpose is to improve understanding of AI and being used in the industries. The brief technical overview of AI will be covered such as big data, data mining, machine learning, etc. The objectives are to learn how digital technologies will be applied to various business settings and how to adapt business strategy and operation in the era of digital transformation. Finally, learning how to utilize AI as the source of competitive advantage.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。 1. 瞭解組織所處環境 2. 分析外部環境之時機和危機 3. 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 4. 探討企業不同層次之應對策略。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one. Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions. We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹有效研發 / 創新管理的概念、原則、與標準，這些概念、原則與標準將成為知識密集型的組織與企業的關鍵競爭優勢。本課程將介紹一些相關企業個案和練習活動，用以連結國家、產業和企業的研發或創新活動，並選定方法和工具進行有效的整合功能、企業業務、研發和創新活動。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the concepts, principles, and standards for effective R&D/innovation management that is becoming the critical competitive advantages for the knowledge-intensive organizations and firms. The course will introduce a number of related cases and exercises with a view to bridge the national, industrial and corporate R&D/innovation activities, along with the presentation of selected approaches, methods and tools to effectively integrate functional, business and corporate R&D and innovation activities as a whole.

description.zh: 設計方法，材料性質，構件受壓行為，構件受拉行為，構件受撓行為，軸力和彎矩之聯合作用，構件受剪行為，構件受扭行為。
description.en: Behavior of Reinforced Concrete Frame   1.Method of Design2.Properties of Materials3.Compressed Behavior of Frame4.Tension Behavior of Frame5.Flexing Behavior of Frame6.Impact of Axial Force And Moment7.Shear Behavior of Frame8.Torsion Behavior of Frame

name.zh: 鋼筋混凝土構件行為學

notes: 王柄雄老師 / 土木館 208

description.zh: 本課程論述工業生產演進與全球綠色設計方法、趨勢，以及規範與法規需求，定義出創新、高品質和優秀的設計。引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，藉以奠定我國未來勞動力市場的循環建築創新能量。
description.en: This course discusses the evolution of industrial production and global green design methods and trends, as well as the requirements of regulations and regulations, and defines innovation, high quality and excellent design. Guide students to study in multiple fields, and put forward the concept of environmental, social and economic balance in architectural design, so as to lay the energy of circular architectural innovation in China's future labor market.

notes: 建築三與職建都所合開

description.zh: 1. 天線基礎 2. 長導線天線 3. 孔徑型天線 4. 陣列分析與合成 5. 自阻抗與互阻抗 6. 信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

notes: 電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹數位金融理論以及介紹代表性的實務案例，課程中除了學習數位金融及人工智慧專業知識外，並結合實作來了解如何應用 APP 及聊天機器人於智慧金融及金融行銷等領域。在實作過程中，將鏈結進駐金融科技創新園區金融機構及新創公司所有業師資源，共同創建教學大綱和案例研究，並導入業師進行課程教學或講座或協同教學 (Co-teaching)，在授課過程中，學生不僅可以學習到 APP 的應用程式開發以及最有系統的方式學會如何設計並建立一支經過用戶體驗設計（介面設計與互動設計）的 Chatbot，同時教導學生如何透過實證場域驗證進行串接 API，發想創意，鼓勵金融創新實證之共創生態發展、降低金融科技創新實證門檻、同時兼顧創新風險控管與不影響市場運作機制，並將科技導入進行創新創業。課程內容包括：創業思維、設計思考、數位金融創新商業模式、無現金社會新興平台與行動支付的發展趨勢、保險科技 (InsurTech) 的應用及發展趨勢、籌資模式演進與 P2P 貸款、金融科技的新興資訊工具應用發展趨勢、虛擬貨幣與區塊鏈專題探討、及機器人理財與 AI 的創新應用等，並探討數位新科技與人工智慧發展對金融產業衝擊、新典範的反思與影響。
description.en: This course will provide students with the latest empowering and practical knowledge on Digital Finance enabling them to understand some of the FinTech changes taking place currently in the financial services industry and, most importantly, the trends that will impact the industry in the future. The course content will include peer to peer lending platforms and crowdfunding, internet finance, online finance, bitcoin, digital currencies, digital payments, big data, insurtech, machine learning and its applications in FinTech such as robo-advising. etc. and their practical impact on global banking and finance.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期資金管理內容，將資金管理理論運用於實務金融市場、Blackjack 21 點。包括最佳化比例、賽馬賭局、損益量化、最大回檔風險、槓桿空間模型、固定分數與固定比例的運用。建議具有基礎程式撰寫能力、先修習過演算法交易、資金管理.. 等課程。
description.en: This course connects the money management content of the previous semester, and applies the theory to the practical financial market and Blackjack 21 points. The course includes optimal bidding fraction, horse racing, profit quantification maximum draw-down risk, leverage space models, and the use of fixed fractions and fixed ratios. It is recommended to have the ability to write basic programs, and have taken courses such as algorithmic trading and money management in advance.

description.zh: 雲端 (Cloud) 與物聯網 (Internet of Things, IoT) 重塑了整個計算世界對於事物的運行方式。除了為各行業提出了新的前沿應用外，也衍生更多在兩者融合對於管理、資訊安全與隱私保護等不得不重視的課題。本課程主要討論雲端與物聯網相關的安全性問題，包括由物聯網衍生出來的新威脅、弱點及兩者融合的相關安全議題。引領學生具備發展雲端與物聯網安全的重要觀念與技術，進而可以分析、設計與規劃未來物聯網與雲端運算融合之應用、與安全管理。
description.en: Cloud and the Internet of Things (IoT) have reshaped the way things are performed across the computing world. In addition to proposing new cutting-edge applications for various industries, there are also more issues that must be paid attention to in the integration of the two, such as management, information security and privacy protection. This course mainly discusses the security issues related to cloud and the IoT, including new threats and weaknesses derived when the two technologies converge. To lead students to understand important concepts and technologies for cloud and IoT security, and then to able to analyze, design, plan application and implement security management of the integration of the cloud and IoT.

notes: 林敬皇老師 / 三四甲、三四乙、碩合 / 科研 240

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解市場定位與策略跟科技產品發展與運用的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前科技產品發展的相關課題，以及整體環境的概述，讓同學對於產業或企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is closely related to the field of technology product development and application through understanding market positioning and strategies. The course content mainly provides students with a basic understanding of the market positioning and strategies of technology products in industries or enterprises through the current topics related to the development of technology products and an overview of the overall environment, and provides students with different perspectives on technology products, market positioning, and management strategies. Understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Technology Products Market Positioning and Strategy

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於如何應用計量方法來進行財金議題之研究，課程內容包括縱斷面資料分析、橫斷面資料分析、追蹤資料分析、以及多變量時間序列分析等，讓學生掌握有助於分析經濟和金融數據的計量經濟學學習方法的知識，培養同學具有應用計量軟體進行分析研究的能力。
description.en: The course is aimed to provide essential econometric methods and their application to research issues. Topics cover regression analysis using time-series data, cross-sectional data, and panel data. The multivariate time-series analysis is also introduced in the course. This course is designed to prepare students with knowledge of econometric methods that are useful for analyzing economic and financial data. Students will focus on learning econometric software skills in estimating and analyzing econometric models.

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

description.zh: 雷射乃 20 世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

notes: ◎/ 機電所和機械自動化合開，限 50 人

description.zh: 本課程提供學生親自動手的智能系統設計與實踐規劃。課程由兩個主要部分構成，包括講座及實作實踐課程。課程共計 18 周將分為以下三個階段：第一階段為大師班系列，由臺北科技大學及麻省理工學院的教授和相關行業的專家擔任主講人。第二階段將著重於基礎製造知識，如 CAD、電腦數值控制、3D 列印、雷射切割、PCB 設計與實做、傳感器與致動器、嵌入式處理器、有線和無線通信。第三階段將結合前階段所習技能致力於原型設計。強調學習如何使用這些工具及其工作原理。課程最後將以期末發表會展示學習成果。
description.en: The course provides a hands-on introduction to the resources for designing and fabricating smart systems. The course consists of two major portions, including lecture and hands-on lab session. The course will be divided into the following three stages. The course will finish with a final presentation and demo session as final exam.

notes: 大學部上限 6 人，研究所上限 5 人

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過 "環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築" 等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

description.zh: 台灣傳統建築史的研究已歷多年發展，累積了相當豐富的研究成果。本課程擬由傳統閩客建築類型所屬之空間文化進行研討，透過 "環境與構造"、"儀式與空間"、"政治與建築" 等進階專題研討，期待引領修課同學進入並體驗台灣傳統建築的深層特色與意涵，過程中除了相關文獻的閱讀，案例調查報告外，並由田野實地參觀，帶領同學感受台灣傳統閩客建築的獨特環境與空間文化。
description.en: The research of the history of Taiwanese traditional architecture has got a great achievement after many years of development. This course is focus on the spatial culture of different types of traditional Hakka and Fujian architecture. I hopes that every students could understand and experience the deep social cultural meanings and features through the study of following three issues :"environment and construction", "rite and space" and "politics and architecture".  This course would not only be proceeded by the reading of related documents and the reporting of different case, it also combined the field visiting and investment to lead students to enjoy the very special cultural heritage.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提供學生解決跨文化管理問題所需的專業知識與行為技能。討論的議題包含文化複雜性、不同組織與個人的文化取向以及世界多種文化維度等面向。本課程鼓勵學生發展跨文化的溝通協調能力與管理技能，使學生在面對全球化組織中的管理問題時，可以從概念與行為上解決這些問題。
description.en: Organizations are becoming increasingly global. This course aims to provide the students with both the intellectual understanding and behavioral skills necessary to solve cross-culture management problems. The course addresses various issues related to the complexity of culture, the cultural orientation of different organizations and individuals, and the mapping of the world cultures dimensions. The course confronts the students with managerial problems in global organizations and requires the students to address these problems conceptually and behaviorally. Students are guided and encouraged to develop skills in cross-cultural communications, negotiation, and managing cultural differences in a multicultural environment, in order to effectively manage international businesses. Finally, students through various contemporary studies will be able to understand the cultural dynamics that are taking place around the globe

notes: 科研 823, 新聘專案教師，經管所 & IMBA&IMFI

description.zh: 1. 電腦通訊網路簡介 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換技術 4. 流量與壅塞控制 5. 介質存取控制機制 6. 區域網路 7. 網路互連技術 8. 無線網路 9. 高速網路
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Communication Networks 2.Layered Structure 3.Routing and Switching Techniques 4.Flow and Congestion Control 5.Medium Access Control Mechanism  6. Local Area Networks 7. Network Interconnection 8. Wireless Networks 9. High Speed Networks

description.zh: 本課程除了介紹工業物聯網技術及工控資安原理之外，更著重在檢測工具的實際操作使用，例如: packet sniffer 等，並以國網中心所建置的 CDX 雲端資安攻防平台進行實作分析與演練，讓學生更了解技術原理的實際應用情境。課程內容包含：●工業控制與智慧製造概論●工業控制與智慧製造的威脅●工業物聯網潛在威脅 ●工控系統通訊協定●工業控制的資安風險評鑑●工控資安●工業控制系統開發安全標準●工業控制系統組件安全檢測標準
description.en: This course aims to introduce security technologies of industrial control system, and mainly focuses on practical operations on learning security detection tools, such as packet sniffer, etc. The course will use the CDX cloud platform for practical exercises.  Industrial security analysis and drills allow students to better understand the practical applications of security for industrial control systems. Course contents including:●Introduction for industrial control & smart manufacturing●Threats to industrial control & smart manufacturing●Threats to industrial IoT●Industrial control system communication protocols●Industrial risk assessment●Industrial control system security●Security standards for industrial control systems●Security testing standards for industrial components

name.en: Security technology for Industrial Control System

notes: 新聘，未到聘停開，英文授課，資工四和資工所合開
